name: My project
description: A full description of my project is here. You could include narrative details about what seasons are included, what group has provided data, whether the project focuses on real-time or retrospective forecasts.

targets.name: pct next week
targets.description: The forecasted percentage of positive tests for the next week

targets.name: cases next week
targets.description: A forecasted integer number of cases for a future week.

targets.name: season severity
targets.description: The forecasted severity for a given season.

targets.name: above baseline
targets.description: Whether or not a region-specific threshold will be exceeded in a given season.

targets.name: Season peak week
targets.description: The week in which the peak y value is observed. Given dates represent the Sunday that begin the peak week. Externally to Zoltar, weeks will be calculated using standard definitions of MMWR weeks.
